Package com.ae2dms.UI

Class GameMediaPlayer

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.UI.GameMediaPlayer
public class GameMediaPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
singleton GameMediaPlayer as a MediaPlayer wrapper to play music and bind with SoundPreference Controller

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    javafx.scene.media.MediaPlayer backgroundMusicPlayer
    The JavaFX MediaPlayer
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer> bgmDuration
    The hashMap to store the duration of the songs with (Song Name, Duration) pair
    javafx.collections.ObservableList<java.lang.String> bgmList
    a list of music that can be chosen, will be bind to view
    private SoundPreferenceController controller
    The controller of SoundPreference view
    int duration
    total duration of the music playing
    private static GameMediaPlayer instance
    The GameMediaPlayer instance
    private javafx.beans.value.ChangeListener listener
    the Listener to call each time music duration change will update the progress in view
    javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty MusicVolume
    The music volume of the MediaPlayer, bind to sound volume in Main and in Controller and in View
    javafx.beans.property.StringProperty nowPlaying
    The name of the music playing
    javafx.beans.property.DoubleProperty SFXVolume
    The SFX volume of the AudioCLip, bind to SFX volume in Main and in Controller and in View
    java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.media.AudioClip> soundEffects
    The hashmap to store all sound effects, can get the AudioClip by searching the name with (SFX Name, AudioClip) pair

    set the status of MediaPlayer PLAY: resume the MediaPlayer PAUSE: pause the MediaPlayer STOP: stop the MediaPlayer and select a random music for next play

    • setMusic

      public void setMusic​(MediaState state)
      set the status of MediaPlayer PLAY: resume the MediaPlayer PAUSE: pause the MediaPlayer STOP: stop the MediaPlayer and select a random music for next play
      Parameters:
      state - MediaState: PLAY, PAUSE, STOP
      See Also:
      MediaState

    • bindSoundPreferencesController
